pages.text: When one needs to strip an item of its magical properties, the $(#490)Disenchanting Table$() is perfect. With the keen energy of moonstones to wipe away magic, this table can accurately remove any individual aura present... $(o)to a point$(). Surround with pillars of crystal to further enhance its abilities.

pages.name: Disenchanting Setup
pages.text: Displayed is the maximum possible setup for the disenchanting table. Fewer pillars yield less power.
